In connection with th« drilling and ooaplation of the new water wall on Jidda Island, which has been named Jidda No.2 Water Well for reoord, I am enclosing herewith 2 copies of the following : (1) Short History (2) Sample descriptions (3) Strip log (4) Klectrio log This information is for your information and record. ^ ^ original well, Jidda #1, was abandoned and satisfactorily cemented to the surface. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 10/20 Drilling for water by BAPCO at Jidda Island

physicalDescription.extent: There is an index (folio 2), referring to another item of correspondence missing from the file.
The foliation is written in pencil, in the top right corner. It begins at the first item of correspondence, on number 1, and runs through to 3, ending on the inside of the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file contains a confidential letter from Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) Chief Local Representative to the Adviser to the Government in Bahrain, Charles Darlymple Belgrave, on the water well on Jidda Island.There is an index (folio 3), referring to another item of correspondence missing from the file.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Shaikh Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah, Hakim of Bahrain
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah
King of Saudi Arabia Sa'ūd bin 'Abd al-'Azīz Āl Sa'ūd
